attributes.action: The government should put rough sleepers as first priority for accommodation
attributes.additional_details:
So called asylum seekers are also adding  to the population of the UK we have nearly 70 million 
people living here. Already. The local  councils are put under pressure to build more housing  everywhere  because of mass migration.This can't continue or we will lose countryside woodland and green belt  including  local parks.&  farm land. Wildlife animals will become extinct. They are already declining because their habitats are destroyed. On a daily basis.
attributes.background: The government  can't continue to take in so called asylum seekers & settling them in the UK. Local councils & the government should remove every single rough sleeper off the streets &  put them up in hotels. Army barracks or a hostel.  unfortunately they are left on the streets & forgotten about.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588351
